body_html: I think that generally there is a need of an intereplay between estimator train process and dataset api. Other than for OHEM this kind of interaction between the two APIs could be useful for other tasks like identify labels with noise in a dataset etc.

body: I think that generally there is a need of an intereplay between estimator train process and dataset api. Other than for OHEM this kind of interaction between the two APIs could be useful for other tasks like identify labels with noise in a dataset etc.
